HEAD.title: Pennsylvania Spatial Data Access | Full Metadata

DIV.PRE: The data describes the boundary of the Lancaster County.
Data created for Lancaster County planning. Intended for illustration and demonstration purposes only.

For use at 1:2400 or smaller scale.
For educational/demonstration purposes only. The Originator, Publisher and Distributor exclude any and all implied warranties and make no warranty or representation with respect to the data files or accompanying documentation, including quality, performance, merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose. These data files and documentation are provided 'as is' and the User assumes the entire risk as to their quality and performance
These data are not to be redistributed for commercial profit. Reproduction or redistribution of this digital data set without permission of the Originator/Publisher is expressly forbidden. The Originator and Publisher should be clearly cited in any product derived from this data. Any modifications to this data must be described in any digital or hardcopy product derived from this data.

DL.DD: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

DIV.PRE: Code identifying the organization generating the data record. All data originally created by ADR in 1993 should have an ADR code.

Can be blank, but must be filled in with "ADR" if UPD-DATE, UPD-FEATURE or UPD-ACTION have a value. A code identifying the organization updating the data record. All data updated by ADR as part of this contract should have an ADR code. The first three characters is a code for the organization as listed below. Characters 4 through 15 should contain an identification code for the employee updating the feature. Valid ADR codes will be ADR_305 and ADR_319
YYYYMMDD format. Modifies the SOURCE-NAME item, and reflects the date of aerial photography (1988)
YYYYMMDD format. Modifies the UPD-NAME item, and reflects the date the data was updated. Date on which record was last updated in ArcInfo
Identifies the map source (if any) for the record
Identifies the map source of the update (if any) for the record
Identifies the data collection method used to acquire the record. Encoded with values representing various data collection methods.
Identifies the type of feature updated.
Identifies the type of update action performed

Lancaster County, the Commonwealth and the Pennsylvania State University excludes any and all implied warranties and makes no warranty or representation with respect to the data files or accompanying documentation, including quality, performance, merchantability, or fitness for a particular purpose. These data files and documentation are provided AS IS and the User assumes the entire risk as to their quality and performance.

DL.DT: Fees:$25 for premastered CD containing shapefiles. Custom requests for small area DXF files available for $40/hour processing fee, $10/CD or $1/floppy media charge.

DIV.PRE: Complete instructions and forms available from http://www.co.lancaster.pa.us/GIS.htm

DL.DD: Hard copy maps can be ordered and created from Lancaster County GIS
DL.DT:
Fees: 8 1/2" x 11" - $5 11" x 17" - $25
Standard map 33 1/2" x 45" - $75; discount rate $50 Mylar map 33 1/2" x 45" - $100; discount rate $75
Custom maps available at a charge of $40/hr.
Copies of existing maps $25.00

DIV.PRE: Acquire, complete and return Map Request form available at: http://www.co.lancaster.pa.us/GISforms.htm
Complete instructions and forms available from http://www.co.lancaster.pa.us/GIS.htm
